title: Pixel3XL restarts itself on wifi hotspot and USB tethering use. What should I do?
content:
I have a month old Pixel3XL.
It restarts it self during wifi hotspot use. 
I gave up on wifi hotspot and started using USB tethering. But today it also restarted itself twice while USB tethering and my meeting was interrupted.

I reset the phone and tried everything like trying it without downloading any apps and trying it each and every time as I download new apps but it still resets.

Now USB tethering started creating problems too. 
I can't use the device with these problems as they are major issues and effects my connectivity and business directly.

I bought it about 45-60 days ago.

Right now I'm out of country. 

What should I do?

Thank you for help....
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
